Text:
Artist: Jason DeruloAlbum: Jason Derulo

Jason DeRulo (born September 21, 1989 in Miramar, Florida) is an American singer-songwriter, dancer, choreographer, producer and actor signed to JR Rotem's label Beluga Heights. He has written hit singles for acts such as Lil Wayne , Pleasure P , Pitbull , Stat Quo and Birdman . His debut single, Whatcha Say, was released to radio in June 2009. It samples the Imogen Heap song 'Hide And Seek' and debuted at #54 on the Billboard Hot 100, and has since peaked at #1.
